## 2nd level header

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
gapminder <- read_csv("data/gapminder_data.csv")
gapminder
aus_data <-filter(gapminder, country == "Australia")
aus_data
ggplot(aus_data,aes(x=year,y=pop))+ geom_point()
```
